attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Airport Park Germiston Used Cars
attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 160 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us.
attributes.finance_estimate:
Estimated monthly payment is R 8 970.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 50 990.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.

attributes.description: Motus Ford Kroonstad offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is 101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome.

attributes.title: 2020 BMW 3 Series 320i M Sport

attributes.description:
DAYTIME RUNNING LIGHTS, TRACTION CONTROL, DUSK SENSING HEADLAMPS
Honda has definitely made some improvements. The Civic feels tauter and sharper, as well as helps to inspire more confidence. Features include Electric Brake Force Distribution, 4-Wheel ABS, Tire Pressure Monitoring, USB Connection, Air Conditioning, Cruise Control, Multi-Function Steering Wheel, Heated Mirrors, Power Mirrors and more. 
Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock. A 1% of the value of the vehicle non refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another nonrefundable deposit to secure it further.. Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!

attributes.description:
There is no doubt the Ranger can function supremely well as a working ute but it can also easily slip into suburban and city life, no worries.
Features of this vehicle include a Multi-Function Steering Wheel, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, Bluetooth Connectivity, Air-Conditioning, Power Steering, Central Locking and much more!
Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short-change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock. A 1% of the value of the vehicle non-refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another non-refundable deposit to secure it further.
